thread.section_title: Hotel de Londres Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfection
thread.title_full: Perfection - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Deiso
title: Perfection
text: Hotel de Londres Eiffel was recommended by friends for our week in Paris. We and two other couples booked and were charmed by the hotel and especially the staff. The concierge worked very hard to persuade a stylist at the next door salon to come in on Sunday afternoon to style the three women for a night reception at The Louvre. Even when we arose late for breakfast, we always enjoyed fresh croissants, even if it meant a trip to the bakery for another pain au chocolat. The location is great with easy access to the metro, the Seine, and lots of sights - Eiffel Tower at night is 5 minutes walk! The local bistros are delicious. We will be back when we return to Paris.
